name: BijColumnHeaderComponent
description:
Provides a visual representation for a BijTitleCellDirective, which allows the user to sort and filter column values.

Example usage:

<bij-header> <bij-title-cell> <ng-template><bij-column-header>firstname</bij-column-header></ng-template> </bij-title-cell> <bij-title-cell> <ng-template [filter]="false"><bij-column-header>lastname</bij-column-header></ng-template> </bij-title-cell> </bij-header>
